Text.Page:
The Invalescos devoted considerable resources to understanding how the argons reshape our world. Their technological prowess is both inspiring and terrifying.

I'd like to know where we are in our studies. Head to Field Base Reciprocity and check in with our researchers.
Argon-shaping technology? Sure, that's what we're studying, but I'm not in charge. The boss is up the ladder there, enjoying the view and the lack of argon attacks!

I forgot! I had the report all along.

I swear, I'd lose my horns if they weren't attached.
I just updated the report this morning. I hope it helps {@LinkCreature:77#3001#Nithan} with our mission.
The implications in this report chill my blood. I wonder what {@LinkCreature:77#3001#Nithan} will make of it.

The argons are reshaping our world, making it less hospitable to us and more suitable for them. It implies, to some extent, that our races aren't wholly compatible.

This report summarizes our findings. Deliver it to {@LinkCreature:77#3001#Nithan}.

Excellent. I'm eager to see what our finest minds make of this latest problem.

Thanks for your help, .
I need that report, <PCNAME>. We can't proceed without it.
